TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeMarshal extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeMarshal abstract sealed

summary.span: Fornisce i metodi helper per il marshalling dei dati tra .NET Framework e Windows Runtime.

span.span: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Oltre che le eccezioni nella sezione delle eccezioni, qualsiasi `HRESULT` diverso da `S_OK` restituito dalla factory sottostante metodo verrà sottoporre a marshalling come un'eccezione.In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.
